page.title: 01GAZETEER PAGE
page.content: Our area of Dumfries is located between the flood plain of the River Nith and the River Cluden.This land is largely agricultural (mainly dairy and arable farming)as well as residential areas.The housing in this area is mainly council with pockets of owner occupied housing.The remainder of this area is taken up by shops. In Dumfries most of the entertainment is contained in our area,this consists mainly of pubs and discos.There is also a theatre,cinema,swimming pool and Palmerston football ground as well as other sporting centres. Transport in our area consists of a bus service,privately owned cars and a railway station,which has just recently been renovated.Dumfries also has a few important landmarks such as the Midsteeple,Greyfriars Church and Robert Burns' Statue.
